website_summaries.verdict: A well-made reformer with four springs (instead of five) and a host of accessories.
pros: Low profile and easy to store under a bed or couch
Comes with reformer box, metal pole for roll-ups, and two workout DVDs
cons: Some products have arrived with incorrect screws
May be hard to adjust for people of different heights

customer_reviews.title: Merrithew was good about sending replacement parts and my husband was able ...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered defective. The foot bar was bent. Merrithew was good about sending replacement parts and my husband was able to fix this. I didn't think to check all the items. I never used or took the plastic off the Cardio-tramp until just recently and this item too was defective - the leg was welded crooked and does not fit into the holes on the wooden platform. I hope that they remain just as good at replacing this expensive item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette M. Zaferakis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible delivery and missing products
customer_reviews.text: The reformer itself is good quality but this has been a less that positive experience. When the product was delivered the box was torn open. The two men that delivered it gave no explanation and were rude about the weight of the product. It was missing the instructions and had NO DVDs as promised. It is expensive and a large purchase for my family and for it to be missing assembly instructions and the DVDs, it is unacceptable and disappointing. The machine itself is nice and I think that it will be of good quality but the order was incomplete and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best...
customer_reviews.text: The equipment is very heavy it really helps to have two people as far as maneuvering it it’s not really something you want to move around and it’s actually quite long so make sure your space will accommodate the equipment I did lotta research and this one has the best reviews for Pilates machines The instructions were lackluster it look like they had been copied several times over and the print was very hard to read so I would not say it was easy to put together don’t think it’s hard it’s just the instructions were difficult to read
customer_reviews.author: Goddess In Northern California

customer_reviews.title: My dream come true - a reformer for home!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with my home reformer. It was shipped so securely and safely to start. It was easy to put together (only a couple knobs and the ropes, actually). It is just as nice as the better studio models at twice the price. The only drawback would be if someone wasn't able to get up and down from so close to the floor - but most Pilates fans have been doing these routines for some time before buying this for home so this won't be a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Totally Happy
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years of Pilates classes I was able to purchase my own reformer and I could not be happier. It is the smaller version of the one we have been using in class and really simple to put together, but it is heavy to initally move, in this case up a flight of stairs. It's getting a lot of use, but I would suggest before purchasing make sure you enjoy Pilates. There is a learning curve in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This reformer definitely serves its purpose. It looks great and is sturdy. Pretty easy to assemble. My only reason for giving up one star is because it's pretty uncomfortable. There's very little padding - kind of like laying on a hardwood floor. The hand straps also are a little uncomfortable. They rub my hands when using them (nothing gloves can't fix). I'd say it's worth the buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: a great investment
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is not taking the leap earlier on buying this. I love going to pilates classes but they're so expensive -- I think the high price tag on this reformer will pay itself off really quick. It doesn't have a tower like a lot of studio reformers do, but other than that it does everything I want it to do! Also, don't be intimidated by the fat assembly manual -- a lot of the steps were already completed when the reformer arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kiely Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Best decision ever to have a home reformer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this reformer just as my Pilates studio closed in March. I am thankful every day. I never expected to use it so much for so long by myself. I can do everything we do on the professional reformers except remove the stationery shoulders but the box works as well
customer_reviews.author: A. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Stott SPX
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder pads to the SPX Stott Pilate reformer did not matched the drilled holes. Company made aware issues was not resolve in timely manner. Therefore we returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I worked out in a Pilates studio for 10 years using the classic wooden reformer with leather straps. But when it came to choosing equipment for home use, the Stotts stood out as the best product for the money. It has taken a bit of getting used to the ropes and the slightly less padded short box, but I could not be more pleased. It's light enough to scoot around, but plenty heavy for stability and resistance. I've been using it about 5 months and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: freelil

customer_reviews.title: Fits through standard doorway
customer_reviews.text: Perfect top of the line reformer. Can be rolled easily and does fit through my standard doorway. I had a problem with the shipper but the quality of the reformer was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RnIT

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars 🌟
customer_reviews.text: The reformer was delivered 4 days earlier (yay) than my scheduled deli every date which made me very happy. The shipment is really heavy (about 250lb) so be prepared for that. Took me less than an hour to put together alone and it is beautiful and works exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: AwaMazing

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without!
customer_reviews.text: Best workout product I have ever bought next right before my Peleton!!
customer_reviews.author: Catlaur

customer_reviews.title: What a great reformer
customer_reviews.text: I've been studying pilates for a long time. My experience with the reformer was with the professional product with a Stott trainer. Considering the professional model is about four thousand dollars, this home reformer offers exactly the same movements for 1/2 the price. It is lower to the ground, and it's about an inch narrower. Delivery was interesting. Mine was a "threshold" service. You need to have help getting it to the room in your house you plan to keep it. Once set up it's easy to move about. I think that we were missing one nut and I had to go to the hardware store. But Great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Proud owner. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: This reformer was extremely easy to put together. As a taller woman finding the right reformer has been problematic and I love the Merrithew. I have been beyond satisfied with this purchase and would highly recommend this reformer for anyone looking for a mid-market machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!! Commercial quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love everything about it. Great quality!! Worth the investment. Spent 6 years at a studio learning Pilates and excited to be able to use safely and save $$ working out at home!! Thanks Amazon and Merrithew!! The delivery company Pilot did a great job also!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item broke after few months of use
customer_reviews.text: Item broke after few months of use. Did not come with the springs as displayed. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with my new reformer. I have been taking classes on a Stott machine for a while now. Super happy to be able to practice at home as well. Solid machine. Perfect condition. Delivery was on time, professional - and they carried the box to the room I wanted it in. Thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaA

customer_reviews.title: COVID COMPLETE PILATES SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: Getting used to the lower, at home version very similar to the ones at the studio I was attending PRE COVID. Figuring it all out but feels so good to be “at it again”. I like the padding, it’s smooth and quiet. It feels solid. Wish I ordered back in March instead of waiting 5 months!❤️
customer_reviews.author: jtceramics

customer_reviews.title: Actual shipping weight not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and wonderful delivery service, but just so you know, the actual shipping box is much heavier than advertised. See photo
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: After doing Pilates for 7 years with an instructor, ...
customer_reviews.text: After doing Pilates for 7 years with an instructor, I can now do everything at home. This machine was exactly what I hoped it would be. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was bought for my wife and she loves it and says its top quality made
customer_reviews.author: Dragonslayer1

customer_reviews.title: but everything was in perfect
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the straps even, but everything was in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The Pilates machine was just as advertised. It is sturdy to use, the carriage glides easily, the set up was simple and the wheels on the front of the machine makes it very easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer m. teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. Extremely well made. Only a couple of items to assemble and allen wrenchs were included with shipment and only too 5 minutes. Would recommend this item to anyone serious about doing this type of work out Make sure you have enough space to leave it out for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: William J Fruen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to deal with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and carry up a steep flight of stairs with tight turns. The machine is solid. Smooth carriage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-built!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reformer about 9 months ago and am extremely pleased with it. The assembly instructions were clear and easy to follow and the quality of the materials is top-notch. I have been working out 3x a week and the reformer still looks as good as new. Well worth the price. I also recommend the Cardio-Tramp rebounder attachment - the jumping sequences are lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.  Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this machine is excellent. All parts work well. One review I read said that the holes were too small for the carriage adjustment. After carefully inserting the adjustment peg the first time I had no issues with this. The tolerances on the machining were very precise and the fit is good. I also read a negative review of the size of hand loops. I also found this quite good. And Iike the double loops, one for hand and one for feet.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE an in-house reformer!
customer_reviews.text: It is identical to the one I have used in the studio - really really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was hoping for and more....Sturdy, Solid....I weigh 220Lbs....and loosing...No Problemo Heartily recommend...Its takes a space but its well worth it...can perform many many muscle tone exercises
customer_reviews.author: Simpleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST purchase I have every made for my health and bad back!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Balducci

customer_reviews.title: This reformer is great. The DVD's that came with it though
customer_reviews.text: This reformer is great. The DVD's that came with it though, did not work. In fact, it locked my laptop with a white screen, and i could not take it off. So it caused me trouble, until I talked to someone that helped get it off my screen. For the price, I think that the DVDs should definitely work. I will call the vendor and ask for new DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the reformer
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I expected. The reformer is a quality product and was very easy to set up. I used it the day it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: The reformer is very well made. I have been using a Stott reformer at the gym and this home reformer is of the same quality just lower to the ground than the one at the gym. It only requires a couple of minutes to put together. The DVD's are very basic so if you are familiar with a good workout you may want to get a more advanced DVD for home use. Overall, I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mrss

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I am a very happy owner of the Stott Pilates reformer. It is easy to use because the springs are adjustable and the exercises are enjoyable. My only misgiving is that the motion of the carriage is somewhat noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Murphy

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: I Love this reformer!!!! Just like the one I was working out on in the gym, but a little lower to the ground. I couldn't be happier with this, and I get a professional workout at home!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Item Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Stott Pilates Reformer for my wife. She has taken pilates from a trainer for a number of years and wanted the same reformer her trainer uses for our home. She was very excited to receive the reformer, but when it arrived the fixed rollers were broken. I called the manufacturer and they shipped replacement rollers but it took a while to receive them. Otherwise, the reformer was easy to assemble (including replacing the rollers), it works great and my wife is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: richearl

product_meta.title: Merrithew at Home SPX Reformer Bundle
feature_bullets: Home Pilates reformer package for increasing core strength, flexibility, mobility, and endurance. Optional Mat Converter allows for Matwork exercises on a comfortable, raised surface
Reformer includes 4 full-tension and 1 half-tension reformer springs for variable resistance
Padded platform extender and adjustable 4-position foot bar; extra-thick foam cushioning
Included accessories: reformer box, metal roll-up pole, and 2 workout DVDs
Reformer dimensions: 26" Width x 96.5" Length | Reformer carriage platform dimensions: 22" Width x 38.5" Length | Height from floor: 10" | Weight capacity: 250 lbs
Wooden standing platform and pommel-style shoulder rests support a wide range of body weights
